required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Injectable Filler for Facial Soft Tissue Augmentation
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Retrospective, Postmarketing Study of Safety and Performance of Hydroxytite, a Calcium Hydroxyapatite Based Filler for Facial Soft Tissue Augmentation.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and performance of Hydroxytite in all subjects who have received sub dermal or deep dermal injections.

primary_outcome.description: Adverse events or Serious adverse events, Injection site reactions.

secondary_outcome.description: To give a score, using the LRS, to Hydroxytite treatment compared to patient's baseline
To give a score, using the Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale (GAIS), to Hydroxytite treatment compared to patient's baseline

study_pop.textblock: All patients treated with Hydroxytite, above the age of 18

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient is over 18 years of age
- Patient received Hydroxytite injection(s).
Exclusion Criteria:
â€¢ Patient declines to participate in the study
